items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.

This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
